caption: The video starts from a scene of a group of people standing outdoors, where it's snowing heavily. A man is tied on the tree, being beaten by this group. Then the scene switched several times quickly, finally into a scene where two men are having dinner. Then the scene switch again into a police station, where a bunch of police officers are talking about evidence and analyzing a case. After talking, they seem to have clear ideas and plans, and they started to taking actions, smashed several illegal private casinos and other illegal places. They arrested many people and confiscate properties.

global.question: When does the things in the video happens, ancient age, modern age or future?
global.answer: It happens at modern age, maybe one decade ago.
